Hosted on GitHub Pages — Theme by orderedlist

I‚Äôm a Faculty Fellow at the Center for Data Science at New York University. I was a PhD student in the Cognitive Science department at Johns Hopkins University, advised by Dr. Paul Smolensky and Dr. Kyle Rawlins. My interests, broadly, are meaning and generalization in human and machine learners. I use computational and experimental linguistic methodologies to explore these areas. Please refer to the Publications section to find out more.
